definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

definition: the Arrow Incident of 1856 (used as pretext for the second Opium War)
The Rape of Nanking (1997 documentary book by Iris Chang 張純如|张纯如)
pinyin: Nan2 jing1 Da4 tu2 sha1 Shi4 jian4

definition: the Mukden or Manchurian Railway Incident of 18th September 1931 used by the Japanese as a pretext to annex Manchuria/also known as 9-18 incident 九一八事變|九一八事变[Jiu3 Yi1 ba1 Shi4 bian4]
see 柳條湖事件|柳条湖事件[Liu3 tiao2 Hu2 Shi4 jian4]

pinyin: qi4 che1 zha4 dan4 shi4 jian4

definition: Kaohsiung Incident (aka Formosa Incident), a crackdown on pro-democracy demonstrations in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, on 10 December 1979 during Taiwan's martial law period

sentences.english: Other violence occurred at Friendship Road and at Liberation Road, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他们说还有其它的暴力事件发生在友谊路和解放大道。

sentences.english: No others were injured in the incident, police said.
sentences.chinese: 在这个枪击事件中没有人受伤，警方说。

sentences.english: We need to experience major events like the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要经历奥运这样的大事件。

sentences.english: Event throughput is bound by the server speed.
sentences.chinese: 事件吞吐量受服务器的速度限制。

sentences.english: Agnes hasn't added or RSVPed to any events yet.
sentences.chinese: 尚未添加或回复任何事件。

sentences.english: Is similar to the overwhelming majority thunderbolt, the network becomes the first disseminator .
sentences.chinese: 如同绝大多数突发事件，网络成为最先传播者。

sentences.english: You can modify the code presented here to support only key-press events.

sentences.chinese: 他任何事件都要按本人的办法做。

sentences.english: No data are available to support a correlation between RGV and adverse event rates.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚无数据说明RGV与不良事件率之间的联系。

sentences.english: Webcast of the take-off and landing will go live 5 minutes prior to each event.
sentences.chinese: 网上直播的起飞和降落会活5分钟前，每个事件。

sentences.english: All other event types, like changes or intermediary steps, are processed differently.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他事件类型，如变化或中间步骤，被区别对待。

sentences.english: Sets a specific day within the year on which this event or to-do should recur.
sentences.chinese: 此事件或待办事项要于一年中的哪一天循环。

sentences.english: He says these incidents gained a lot of attention seven or eight years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这些事件七八年前得到了大量的关注。

sentences.english: Data events are used to emit additional data information.
sentences.chinese: 数据事件被用于发出额外的数据信息。

sentences.english: Relative study of event-related potentials elicited by calculating and number recognizing;
sentences.chinese: 与另一事件经常伴随发生或者密切相关的事件。
